EmailTemplate.name: Support Fallback Auto Reply
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: {{{Case.Subject}}} - Ticket #{{{Case.CaseNumber}}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
Thank you for reaching out to Retool Support! The ticket number for your message is {{{Case.CaseNumber}}}.
We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
Sincerely,
The Retool support Team
Original message:
